metadata.Title: CVE-2021-38593 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
Qt 5.x before 5.15.6 and 6.x through 6.1.2 has an out-of-bounds write inQOutlineMapper::convertPath (called from QRasterPaintEngine::fill andQPaintEngineEx::stroke).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38593` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqt5concurrent5 - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5core5a - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5dbus5 - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5gui5 - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5network5 - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5opengl5 - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5printsupport5 - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5sql5 - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5sql5-ibase - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5sql5-mysql - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5sql5-odbc - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5sql5-psql - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5sql5-sqlite - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5sql5-tds - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5test5 - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5widgets5 - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
libqt5xml5 - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
qt5-flatpak-platformtheme - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
qt5-gtk-platformtheme - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
qt5-qmake - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
qt5-qmake-bin - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
qt5-xdgdesktopportal-platformtheme - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
qtbase5-examples - 5.15.2+dfsg-14
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: qtbase-opensource-src package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.2+dfsg-14').
qtbase-opensource-src-gles package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
